website_summaries.verdict: Simple stringer that you won't have to spend a lot of time trying to learn how to use.
pros: Good price point for an entry-level tennis racket stringer that will help you get the job done at home
Mounting system provides support for all different kinds of rackets
Good level of build quality for a low-priced tennis stringer that's sure to give you a long life
cons: Occasional issues with keeping the strings tightly clamped

customer_reviews.title: Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I needed to string my own racket for various reasons. No experience. Watched a half hour video, got the proper specs online for my racket, paid VERY close attention to the instructions, and I had a freshly strung racket in an hour and a half that goes "pingggg" when you tap it. Came with free strings so I could get right to work. The machine doesn't take much space at all. All the attachments and pliers and so on are high quality. Just works. Really very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cambium0

customer_reviews.title: high-quality and easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Klippermate racket stringing machine based on all the positive reviews here, and I've been very pleased. This is my first racket stringing machine (our teenage tennis player started to go through so many strings it was becoming expensive and a pain to have the rackets restrung at our local tennis store), and I've had a great experience with it over the past five months. The product is well-made and easy-to-use, especially with the clear racket-stringing instructions provided by the manufacturer. The first few rackets I strung took me over two hours, but now I'm down to just over an hour, and I find the process of stringing a racket satisfying and enjoyable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: very solid home-stringing solution.
customer_reviews.text: I've strung probably a dozen rackets by now. Really develop a good feel for the elasticity of the string (or lack thereof). The included long-nose pliers were not so sweet, but the vise-grip like clamps are great. I can now do a full two-piece string job in 40 minutes if i focus and hustle. Its great. Paid for itself already.
customer_reviews.author: sizzle

customer_reviews.title: My son purchased this item and has used it multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this item and has used it multiple times to string his tennis racquets. It's not as easy/sleek as some of the more expensive models, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: thefamilyman

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Even though it takes a rather long time to string a racquet, for those of you who are "do-it-yourselfers" for everything at home, this is a great product. I've strung three racquets now and I've got it down to about one hour and twenty minutes. Perhaps I'll get to one hour. But I like to make sure each string is in the right place and I fuss about it and take my time. The product itself is of great quality. All the soldering is strong, no weak and cheap parts, and I can see this thing lasting for a very long time. I'll keep this updated if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! You get a bunch of different strings to practice and good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great investment even if you are a recreational tennis player. Saves time on dropping of raqueta especially if you don’t live close to a tennis racket store. There’s how to videos on you tube and comes with great instruction. I’m now stringing co tennis players where I play tennis. They can’t tail a difference from a drop weight Raquet stringer.
customer_reviews.author: Big J.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Thus machine is great. My kid breaks 17g polys once a week and I've been stringing her racquet for a year and a half with this. I'm not super fast so it takes me a little over an hour as I'm watching tv. Great user manual. Tension is good. I've strung my own racquet with it. Well worth the investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Spinning Top

customer_reviews.title: Solid and accurate
customer_reviews.text: The string holder was made of solid metal and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kim

customer_reviews.title: What a great product and deal!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Every part is so well made. It is easy to use. The instruction is very clear. I also appreciate the generously included strings. It is small so I could simply set it up at my kitchen counter stringing while watching some games! Money well spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Y

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product last week. I have played tennis for 15 years, but never bothered with stringing my racquets. I play with heavy top spin, so it is not uncommon for me to break 4-5 racquets per months. After reading the reviews of the Klippermate, I took a plunge and bought it. Product did not disappoint me. It is very sturdy, feels substantial, and very easy to use. So far I re-strung three of my racquets. First one took about 2.5 hours, next two were 1.5 hours. The instructions included with the stringer are excellent and do a fantastic job in guiding you through the stringing process. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Montana

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have strung 3 racquets so far and the instructions are clear and the klippermate is fairly easy to use. The dropweight system is not difficult and appears to provide a consistent tension. No issues or concerns after one month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Johngr54

customer_reviews.title: MY HUSBAND ENJOYED THIS GIFT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband as it was on his wishlist. He absolutely loves having it to restring his and my sons rackets to the way they like. He has used it several times now and always says how much he enjoys having it over going to get it done at a shop. I'm so glad i got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: awesome stringer
customer_reviews.text: I love this stringing machine. I used to bead jewelry so feel comfortable with the tools used to string racquets. It may be frustrating if you are not good doing detailed work with your hands and following directions. The instruction manual is pretty good, but don't rush through the first few times, or you will likely make a mistake. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: ten

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE MACHINE: CONSTANTLY SLIPPING
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all of the recommended maintenance tips from clipper and it keeps slipping after only stringing about 6 rackets. Do not buy a klippermate, look into the other brands like gamma, or don't get a drop-weight machine at all. An absolutely terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: troublesome
customer_reviews.text: I retrun this item,my husband just use a string. He tried to use it ,but it is particularly troublesome. so we return it after three days. But 80 dollars was deducted. I think it is very unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: zhaozhao

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I bought the model my husband had been looking at for the last few months. The first racquet took a while to string as other's have stated. He said this beats taking his racquets to the big box store, paying $25 for the string so stringing is "free." Bought the calibrator and clamp too, haven't heard him say much about those additional items.
customer_reviews.author: midwestmom

customer_reviews.title: string your own rackets at home
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our son who plays a lot of tennis. He says it's easy to use and does as good a job as the sporting good stores he used to get his rackets strung at
customer_reviews.author: patt seyller

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STRINGER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this having never strung a racket before I was sick of spending a ton of money as I break strings a lot. This is the answer to my prayers. I have strung 10 rackets now and have been doing them in under an hour since the second one!! Even my long time tennis friends ask me to do their rackets now after seeing mine. This machine performed flawlessly and don't think I can live without it now. If you break strings like I do and you want your racket back fast buy this stringer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Unhynged

customer_reviews.title: Does good job.
customer_reviews.text: It works as designed. The learning curve is tough. I took two hours to build my first racket.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent professional quality.
customer_reviews.text: It came with all tools needed, and 5 packs of strings. Heavy duty and quality. Made a huge difference in the feel of the racket. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jsw

customer_reviews.title: Klippermate Stringing Machine
customer_reviews.text: This Klippermate Tennis Racquet Stringing Machine is great. It comes with instructions that are easy to follow and with some practice you will find yourself stringing your own racquet in less than 2 hours. Yes I said less than 2 hours because you would have to string a racquet about 2 times a month in order to get to where it takes less than an hour. This Stringing Machine can be used on a kitchen table or any sturdy flat surface, every thing you need to string your racquet is included with the machine. I would rate this machine at 4 1/2 stars. The only drawback is time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Klippermate Machine is perfect answer.
customer_reviews.text: The Klippermate Stringing Machine we purchased is performing excellently and above our expectations. It is sturdy and rugged enough to perform under almost daily use. I would purchase from Klippermate again, but feel I will not be needing a new Strining Machine for quite some time. This is a great product and we got it at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale H

customer_reviews.title: And this little one works just fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm stringing at least 1 racket a week for my kids. And this little one works just fine for me. I can even bring it on the tournaments with me.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Terradot

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Strung 3 racquets already. Never strung before. I have to say it was fun and of course the first one took forever. Went and played with the strung racquet and played great. The directions were excellent and the tools they include are all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love this product it is so simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it is so simple to use, as a buggier I was able to sting two raquets is less than two hours comes with instructions and all necessary tools to do the job
customer_reviews.author: Arthy

customer_reviews.title: I love this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely fantastic product coming from a quality and practicality stand-point. I have used it 10+ times in the period of 2 years and love it. Very well made and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R

customer_reviews.title: The online Klippermate video was a real help
customer_reviews.text: Still testing it - only strung 3 racquets so far - but the results seem good and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Orlin E Johnson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this stringing machine. It took me just two times (two racquet stringings) to use this perfectly. I have not tried another machine before, but I am happy with it. I break strings about every 2-3 weeks, and use hybrid bed (poly + sync). I bought it four months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shizuo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does the job well. The included instructions are very good also -- as a complete beginner, I was able to string my first racket with nary a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Travis G.

customer_reviews.title: User friendly with the owner’s manual. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: For personal use or other friends’, very useful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. My son breaks string every week and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. My son breaks string every week and the guy at the tennis club who does our restringing suggested for us to buy this particular model and save money in the process. I watched some videos at YouTube and we decided to give it a shot. One of the best decisions we have ever taken regarding the matter. Ease to use and WORKS just fine, I highly recommend this machine to any serious tennis player who is tired of replacing strings frequently; you will save tons of money and time. Once you come to the point that you are comfortable with the stringing process using this machine you come up with your exact specifications that work for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to operate with the machine. The video I found on YouTube and the user manual shipped within the package helped me done my first stringing in less than 2 hours. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosen Manev

customer_reviews.title: More time consuming than other stringers but very good.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and does the job. More time consuming than other stringers but very good.
customer_reviews.author: movierock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to work with. Great online video with good instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for saving me money on tennis racquet ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for saving me money on tennis racquet string now i can string my racquet.God bless and keep staying in business (PEACE).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great as Advertised. All metal construction with nice tools included. I definitely recommend to everyone. Recommended also by our kids coach.
customer_reviews.author: Tuba Latoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Paid for itself in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JimboC

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for a serious tennis player
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stringing result from the very first racket I ever done. Has done 5 so far with different hybrid setup without fail. Great investment for my tennis hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Setya Kusuma

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is virtually identical to the machine that got me through high school and college tennis. It will wear out with heavy use...especially the teeth....but believe me it is a great investment. Easy enough to use once you get the hang of it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fife

customer_reviews.title: DIY racquet stringing
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. Getting a feel for the drop weight mechanism takes some time but if you break strings frequently or need to experiment with different string types or tensions, you need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Convenient. Allows you to restring on your own time, if shop is closed or busy. Break-even on labor costs after 13 sets of string. Portable enough to bring to those out-of-town matches and restring in hotel. You can avoid buying a third racket. I'm still a little slow at 1.75 hours after 5 restrings.....shooting for 1 hour, but no big deal on a weekend while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: JP95 in GA

customer_reviews.title: Very good American made
customer_reviews.text: Very good sturdy product, I only strung one racquet, but pretty much on my own, since it took a while to figure out, but I did. At this rate it will take about a year to pay it off. But, it is okay since I will restring my own racquet when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: and easily; manual and string pattern information were detailed and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's rare to find the exceptional customer service I had with Klipper USA, they had quick responses and guided me through my purchase with courtesy. My order shipped same-day, and arrived in two days. I strung two racquets in 4 hours the day it arrived as a first-time stringer. Works perfectly, and easily; manual and string pattern information were detailed and extremely convenient. They had all the tools you need and provided a couple sets of string. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Shao

customer_reviews.title: happy racquet stringer
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son who loves it and has already strung several rackets. He couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: franb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the klippermate. I needed a cheap stringing machine for squash, and then i found this and it was perfect. The only upside down was the weight. I had to buy a tension calibrator to know the exact weight, but I found a cheap one on ebay and it worked great to. But the klippermate was perfect and I don't need anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Bendik Geitle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. Fair pricing to.. Thanks for the fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Colangeli

product_meta.title: Klippermate® Tennis Racquet / Racket Stringing Machine
product_meta.description: America's best selling racquet stringer for the past 30 years, the Klippermate is used by more players than any other stringer. Join thousands who save money each year by stringing their own racquets. Free shipping offer available at klipperusa.com where you can also read our Frequently Asked Questions, see a review by Tennis Magazine and view testimonials from many of our satisfied customers. *The Klippermate utilizes the drop weight tensioning system. This system is accurate within the industry standard of plus or minus one pound and is calibrated for life. Our exclusive Cam String Gripper eliminates the need for the clutch or ratchet pulling system resulting in an average stringing time of only thirty minutes. *The Klippermate is the only machine that comes with string clamps made out of steel and guaranteed for a lifetime. All other machines provide plastic composite clamps that do not hold as well, may have sharp edges and are not covered by a lifetime guarantee. *Strong two point mounting system guarantees damage free stringing and supports all size racquets. *The base of the Klippermate is made of steel and not light-weight aluminum or plastic. This eliminates the need to bolt or clamp the stringer down during use and allows you to string anywhere. *Since 1967, over forty years experience in the manufacturing of racquet stringers has led to the development of the best selling stringing machines in America. We're proud to be the only company making racquet stringing machines in the USA and the only one to offer an unlimited lifetime guarantee along with a 30-day money back guarantee.
feature_bullets: The most accurate stringer on the market! Used by more players than any other stringing machine.
The only one Made in the USA with an Unlimited Lifetime Guarantee and a 30-day money back guarantee.
No assembly required. Includes complete tool kit along with a free string and grip package.
The most complete and easy to follow instructions available with any stringer. Free tech support.
Free shipping offer available at our website. Visit klipperusa.com for details.
